channel.title: In need of web developer/PhP programmer for Mysql Db's
channel.description:
[center]Ok I'm trying not to give anything away here as this is going to be a big release but tackling it by myself has proven to be somewhat difficult.[/center]
Server description: Base: 317 (Niobe source) Loading 667 textures Working membership system Next generation slaying system All skills 100% working Custom gfx & animations Fully working bank tabs & bank system 100% working price checker
and much much more...
[i][b]What I require[/b][/i]
I require someone with a lot of php and mysql experience capable of executing simple tasks such as a login system through the server to an sql database. I've spent a lot of time working on this server and I'm only looking for 1 [i]'team-mate'[/i]. If you see yourself the ideal candidate then I'd love to hear from you.
Media: [spoiler] [center][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/dfvigz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2liea0y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/t6f63c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34xqj9i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/uxbi8.png[/img][/center] [/spoiler]
Apply using the following template: [code] Location: Skype: Age: Talk me through some of your past experience:
[/code]
